thread.title: LOOK: Beyonce performs at the 2017 Grammy Awards as family cheers her on
thread.title_full: LOOK: Beyonce performs at the 2017 Grammy Awards as family cheers her on

author: Rappler.com
title: LOOK: Beyonce performs at the 2017 Grammy Awards as family cheers her on
text:
Entertainment News LOOK: Beyonce performs at the 2017 Grammy Awards as family cheers her on A pregnant Beyonce took the stage at the 2017 Grammys, while Jay Z and Blue Ivy watch from the audience! Published 10:29   10:39   Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images for NARAS/AFP 
  A pregnant Beyonce brought down the house at the 2017 Grammy Awards on   Manila). (IN   ) 
Beyonce performed "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles" at the Staples Center in LA, dressed in a jewelled gold gown and matching gold headpiece.
